SELECT cpr_cd, cpr_nm, cpr_unit, cpr_spec, cpr_typ FROM cm_product_mng WHERE 1=1
AND cpr_cd LIKE '%' || #{cprCd} || '%'
AND cpr_nm LIKE '%' || #{cprNm} || '%'
ORDER BY cpr_cd

SELECT bom_cd, bom_start_dt ,bom.cpr_cd, cpr_nm FROM cm_product_mng cpr JOIN cm_bom_mng bom ON cpr.cpr_cd = bom.cpr_cd WHERE 1=1
AND cpr_nm LIKE '%' || #{cprNm} || '%'
ORDER BY bom_cd

SELECT cbm.cm_cd, cm_nm, cm_sq, cmm_nm, cbmt_cnsm, cbmt_ms FROM cm_bom_mng bom JOIN cm_bom_mnfct cbm ON bom.bom_cd = cbm.bom_cd JOIN cm_process_code cm ON cbm.cm_cd = cm.cm_cd JOIN cm_bom_mtrl cbmt ON cbm.cbm_cd = cbmt.cbm_cd JOIN cm_mtrl_mng cmm ON cbmt.cmm_cd = cmm.cmm_cd JOIN cm_product_mng cpr ON bom.cpr_cd = cpr.cpr_cd WHERE cpr_nm LIKE '%' || #{cprNm} || '%' ORDER BY cm_sq
